title: Help
body: I cant get into game after champ select

replies.body:
Hey there,

Do you receive a specific error message when attempting to load into a game?
No but i haven't gotten it ever.  Another major problem is that the game will freeze for 2-3 seconds every now and then.  Is this a common client issue?

It's the new client riot say's it is ready but isn't you aren't the only one with this issue, Have a look through some previous posts on the fourm someone might have a solution there! hope it gets fixed soon!


p.s riot doesnt seem to want to answer why they thought the client was ready when it very clearly isn't.
